description: Finds values in a list that match a search string or regular expression.

input.name: pattern
input.description: A string or a regular expression to be searched for within the list. Regular expressions must be wrapped with / character (e.g. /.*/).

output.name: values
output.description: A new list with the elements that match the testing expression; otherwise, an empty list is returned.

output.name: complementary
output.description: A new list with the elements that do not match the testing expression.
